title: Created a P/Invoke Generator
body:
**Description of Change**

This PR is mainly for the addition and usage of a new p/invoke generator, but a little more:

 - The extra work to map the C API to the internal C# API is unnecessary and can be automated. It most often just involves copying the structs and enums across - and then renaming them. Same with the imports, just a matter of copying and fixing up the C-isms.  
   The new generator will be able to do all this work for us, leaving us to focus on a nice C API, and then wrap the generated C# with a beautiful, user-friendly API.
   And, there will be less mistakes because I won't forget to change member types/names when copying similar code :)
 - Also start splitting the build for the native into separate architectures. Instead of building all 4 Windows arches in serial and taking hours, build them in parallel in less than 1 hour.

**Bugs Fixed**

N/A

**API Changes**

Should be none.

**Behavioral Changes**

Should be none.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
